ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISCHANGED(aecm__QA_Complete__c), ISPICKVAL( aecm__Status__c,'Project Completed'), NOT( aecm__QA_Complete__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: This Pain Point Solution is associated with a completed Program Project. You must change this association if you wish to change the status in order to uncheck QA complete check box.
